DOC.brief_summary: This project analyze influence interferential current therapy exercise program individual unilateral impact syndrome diagnosis . To end , volunteer gender , age 18-59 year , unilateral , unilateral pain shoulder 3 month duration , least grade 4 pain numerical scale pain assessment , positivity In least 2 3 orthopedic test impact syndrome , randomize follow group : exercise group , exercise + ultrasound group , exercise group + interferential current . Sixteen consecutive treatment session perform , volunteer evaluate , mean follow instrument : Numerical scale evaluation pain , Shoulder pain disability index ( SPADI ) , Pain-Related Catastrophizing Thoughts Scale , apply Numerical scale evaluation pain end Each session one month end treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Influence Interferential Current Therapy Treatment Individuals With Shoulder Impact Syndrome : A Randomized , Placebo Controlled Clinical Trial .
DOC.criteria: History anterolateral , unilateral pain shoulder 3 month duration . Medical diagnosis , minimal grade 4 pain numerical scale pain assessment , positivity least 2 3 orthopedic test impact syndrome : Neer , Hawkins Jobe . Fibromyalgia diagnosis , pregnancy , numbness tingle upper limb History shoulder trauma , shoulder related disease , rupture tendon , ligament laxity , symptom numbness / Tingling upper limb , history shoulder / cervical surgery use corticosteroid injection shoulder , analgesic , antiinflammatory muscle relaxant use undergone physiotherapeutic treatment last 6 month .
